Job Description: Greetings from Jobs Territory........We have an opportunity in our client for Backend Software DeveloperRoles and Responsibilities  Position : Backend Software EngineerLocation : PAN INDIA Exp         : 3 - 5 yrsCandidates only from Product Based Company can apply.Responsibilities:working on      our P2P and cryptocurrency exchange platforms to build more features      around it.Collaborating      with various stakeholders to determine software requirementsWazirX being      a financial product,  involved in building tools to make our users      data more secure.working on      blockchain technologieshelp maintain      code quality and organization.We expect you to      learn about new software technologies, and proactively look for ways to      make WazirX better.expert in writing      background tasks, test driven development.experts in Ruby,      Golang and Rails framework enjoy collaborating with the front-end      developers and other team members to establish objectives and design more      functional, cohesive codes to enhance the user experience.committed to      quality, and having code solving skills
